options_PreventOnlyUnloadedTabs.message: Only prevent unloaded tabs from becoming active when dragged.

options_DetectLongPress.message: Detect if a tab is long pressed. If there are listeners to this Tree Style Tab API event then a long pressed tab cannot be dragged. A tab is long pressed if the time between the "mouse down" event and the "mouse up" event is longer than 400ms.

options_PreventOnLongPress.message: Prevent long pressed tabs from becoming active. (This option only takes affect if the detect option is checked.)
